entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
